Hey there

My name is Sam Granger. Logic and creativity not only influence my code, they drive my life. I'm a front end web developer whose sites and elements help people tell stories, have insights, and make connections.

When I'm not working or thinking (or thinking about thinking), I'm usually playing guitar, learning a new language, or spending time in the woods and waters of my home state of Michigan.

I'm always looking for new problems to solve, new projects to take on, and new people to meet. So take a look around and drop me a line.

How I Work

I'm like my code: clean, logical, and fun to interact with.

Most days you'll find me revamping someone's Wordpress site, coding up some custom features, or building a site from the ground up. Taking a vision from sketches on paper to pixels on screen is my joy. The problem solving along the way is my creative process.

I've always been a jack of all trades and master of some. And I bring to web development a vision I gained through my background in photography, illustration, publishing, and film.

Here's a handful of images that help you see how I often look at the world. If you'd like to see a portfolio or case study, get a hold of me anytime.

Backstory

Like I mentioned above, I bring a lot to the table from of my diverse background. Before coding I was a teacher, an editor, an illustrator, a photographer, a filmmaker, a coffee marketer, and an academic. If you're interested in any of that, check out my resume below.

If you're interested in more philosophical topics, here are a bunch of talks I've given at various conferences on the side.
